name: Free Kick Asian Cup 2016
description:
Asian Cup of FreeKicks - score a goals with a beautiful penalty strikes.
Make a goals from the Free Kicks shots - become an asian champion for the soccer free-kick and penalties.

Your task is to score as many goals from free kicks, from a different shot positions, angles and a directions to the GOAL!
You will face standard soccer players "wall", difficult angles, different distances and goalkeeper.

Choose a team, choose an opponent - and score as many goals and follow your team online rating.

All points earned will be added to the total points of your team and is subtracted from the total ranking of your opponents. So the more goals you make the higher the ranking of your team.
